comments:
3.1 M4 candidate
If you launch the workbench with a plug-in that fails to load the workbench
crashes and failt to start at all. This happens often to me because my workspace
contains plug-ins in varying states - the following traceback is very common: 

The presentation can't handle the fact that a view/editor can't be created.

This shouldn't be a problem any more with changes that were made to part creation error handling.

I tested this in 3.2M6.  When an active view's plugin "disappears" over a restart, you now just get a popup stating that it Could not restore the workbench layout and details that it could not create the missing view.  Then it brings up the rest of the workbench window.

If you are still encountering this problem, please REOPEN the bug with some more stack traces :-)

Thanx,
PW
verified in RC5

PW
